tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WarehouseLayout (
    warehouse_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    warehouse_location DECIMAL(10, 6),
    warehouse_capacity INT,
    layout_geometry GEOGRAPHY,
    inventory_list JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE warehouse_layout (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    aisle_number INT,
    rack_number INT,
    shelf_number INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_placement (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    aisle_number INT,
    rack_number INT,
    shelf_number INT,
    position_lat DECIMAL,
    position_long DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT,
    quantity INT,
    location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES warehouse_layout(warehouse_id)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_movement (
    movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inventory_id INT,
    from_location_id INT,
    to_location_id INT,
    movement_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (inventory_id) REFERENCES inventory(inventory_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (from_location_id) REFERENCES warehouse_layout(warehouse_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (to_location_id) REFERENCES warehouse_layout(warehouse_id)
);
CREATE TABLE warehouse_layout ( id INT, location_name VARCHAR(255), total_capacity INT, PRIMARY KEY (id) );
CREATE TABLE inventory_items ( item_id INT, item_name VARCHAR(255), quantity INT, location_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (item_id), FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES warehouse_layout(id) );
CREATE TABLE inventory_status ( item_id INT, last_checked TIMESTAMP, status VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY (item_id), FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES inventory_items(item_id) );

CREATE TABLE material_handling_devices ( device_id INT, device_name VARCHAR(255), device_type VARCHAR(50), location_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (device_id), FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES warehouse_layout(id) );
CREATE TABLE device_status ( device_id INT, last_checked TIMESTAMP, status VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY (device_id), FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES material_handling_devices(device_id) );
